title: After the new snow rift update can't egt past laoding screen
body: Okay so I recently got "afk" timer ( low priority ) because I couldn't connect past the loading screen. it showed everyone at 100% and it just stayed there. My team remade the game but I thought it was super annoying. This was happening before with not even being able to connect to the game. now it gets stuck at the loading screen

replies.body:
Hmm.. It sounds as if your connection to the gameservers is *poor* or *unstable*. This can often be resolved by working through the steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I'd like you to give those steps a look.

Let me know if you still have issues after those steps.
